name: Underwater (ExbyteStudios, Takedo24, KYMUS_POWER, Cc_ybludok_iz_frankfurta, Deo Esor, Solitude11111, Ochko_Borisa, YegorBroFun)
name_original: Underwater (ExbyteStudios, Takedo24, KYMUS_POWER, Cc_ybludok_iz_frankfurta, Deo Esor, Solitude11111, Ochko_Borisa, YegorBroFun)
description:
Underwater world generation, puzzles, trade location, item improvement, looting.

Story:

 A certain explorer-sailor, having overheard the conversation of his comrades, learned that near the island of Mauritius there is a sunken city, in which there are riches of a certain civilization. The main character is going on an expedition to get the jewels and the crown.

System requirements: 

 CPU: Intel pentium g4600 

 GPU: Gtx 750 ti  

 Mem: 6gb 

OS: Windows 10                                                                                    

Controls:

WASD - for character control

RMB - for camera control

F - interaction

Hold I - inventory

Left,Right,Up,Down - puzzles control
